onboarding.welcome_description:
This is an E-money for {money_name}.
Let’s Start!
onboarding.onboarding_2:
Payment is easy,
Just scanning the QR Code.
onboarding.onboarding_3:
You can charge to the wallet
with a credit card or bank balance.
onboarding.onboarding_4:
You can get information
about the shop.
onboarding.guide_message:
Tap the card.
QR code can be displayed.

input_code.header_description: A verification code has been sent to {email} via email. Please enter the authorization code.

registration.header_description: This member name will be used for the Pokepay application.

not_found.header_description: The page you are looking is not available.

main.topup_message: You can topup only money via credit card or cash.

expiration_list.some_balances_expire_in_week: Some balances expire within a week

account.confirm_image_delete_title: Are you sure want to delete?
account.confirm_logout_title: Are you sure want to logout?
account.confirm_logout_message: If you use this money again, Please re-login.
account.confirm_delete_account: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
account.delete_account_with_balance: If you delete your account, these balances will be deleted. Once deleted, these balances cannot be restored.
account.delete_account_no_balance: If you delete your account, all information registered in your account will be deleted. Once deleted, the information cannot be restored.
account.didnt_receive_sms_code: Didn’t receive a verification code after 30 secs?'
account.dont_delete_account: Don't Delete and Back to Previous Screen
account.enter_code_to_continue: We have sent you a verification code. Enter the code to continue.
account.enter_sms_code_to_continue: We have sent you a verification code. Enter the code to continue.
account.name: Name
account.start_original_emoney: Start an original e-money system for your own store
account.we_are_looking_developer: We are looking for developer to build Pokepay with!

payment.invalid_qr_msg_title: This is not a payment QR code
payment.invalid_qr_msg_text: Please confirm the QR code is for payment

feature_not_available.title: News feature isn’t available
feature_not_available.description:
This feature will be added in our next update.
Please look forward to it!

charge.cc_info_text:
In order to protect your credit card information, we ask you to set up "Identity authentication service (3D Secure)" by your credit card company.

Please contact your credit card company for details on how to set up this service.
charge.indication_message: Indication based on the Act on Specified Commercial Transactions
charge.pc_responsibility_message: Pocket Change Co., Ltd. is responsible for sales regarding the recharge (purchase) of this money by credit card payment. Your credit card statement will show "Electronic Money Charge (Pocket Change)."
charge.register_id_auth_message: You must register for the Identity authentication service (3D Secure) before using this application.
charge.what_is_identity_auth: What is the Identity authentication service?
charge.enter_valid_card_number: Please enter a valid card number
